conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Excuse me, sir. Do you have any information on why the train is delayed?

conversation.Name: Emma
conversation.Text: We've been waiting for quite a while now.

conversation.Name: Conductor
conversation.Text: I apologize for the delay. There was an unexpected technical issue with the train.

conversation.Name: Alice
conversation.Text: Is there an estimated time for when we can expect the train to depart?

conversation.Name: Emma
conversation.Text: We have important commitments to attend to.
